issue.title: [R] Update Arrow for R cheatsheet to include GCS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18283](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18283). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Arrow for R cheatsheet was released in 8.0.0. It could use an update to highlight new features released since then, for example reading+writing to Google Could Storage (in addition to S3).

https://github.com/apache/arrow/tree/master/r/cheatsheet
